Report on Hong Kong Police Force abusing Whatsapp

Dear Whatsapp,I am writing to report the violation of terms of service by the Hong Kong Police Force. Hong Kong Police Force launched 10 hotlines for ‘report of violence’ through Whatsapp on Sept 10. The hotlines only allow online conversations for collecting evidence and information regarding the social movement. It's criticized by citizens that the hotlines are the replication of ‘ criticize and judge’ during Cultural Revolution which is another kind of white terror. I have reason to believe that they have violated the terms of service of Whatsapp. Details are as follows.

Personal Account:
Violated the Terms of Service of WhatsApp as the account owner is using this account for “non-personal use”
Business Account:
Inappropriate massive data collection of personal info without other users’ consensus

As the hotlines were switching between business account and personal account from time to time, they may have violated both regulations above.

Below are some evidence of the official announcement from HKPF.https://www.scmp.com/news/hong-kong/hong-kong-law-and-crime/article/2152375/hong-kong-police-launch-new-online-reporting
